snippet: The Bronx Museum announced Wednesday that it had received $500,000 from the Ford Foundation, part of a campaign to raise $1 million for a new acquisitions fund that will focus on buying the works of contemporary artists with strong connections to the...
abstract: The Bronx Museum announced Wednesday that it had received $500,000 from the Ford Foundation, part of a campaign to raise $1 million for a new acquisitions fund that will focus on buying the works of contemporary artists with strong connections to the Bronx.

headline.main: Bronx Museum Gets Major Gift to Acquisitions Fund
